name: Test Specialist Reminder
content: Hi (client_name). Just a reminder you have an appointment with (calendar_name) on (date) at (time) at (location). Please call our office on (phone) if you may be late or cannot attend. This is an automated SMS. Please do not reply

name: Christian's office reminder
content: You (client_name) have an appointment on (date) at (time) with Code for Australia. Location of appointment is at (location). To change call us on (phone). With (calendar_name)
